All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBook
Adds a new book to the library.
AddBookWindow
AddBookWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants to add new books.
This class is created and executed when "Add" option is clicked under Books Menu in MainWindow class.
When executed, it displays a pop up window that provide TextFields to write the book's details: "Title, Author, Publishing Date and Publisher".
AddPatron
Adds a new patron to the library.
AddPatronWindow
AddPatronWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants to add new patrons.
It's created and used when "Add" option is clicked under Patrons Menu in MainWindow class.
It displays a form to type in Patron details: (Name, Phone Number, Email).
Book
Book class models a book in the library.
BookDataManager
This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
Borrow
Adds a new patron to the library.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method creates a loan object and attaches it to the given patron and book.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "borrow" command is given by the user.
The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
Command
 
CommandParser
 
DataManager
 
DeleteBook
Deletes a book from the library.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method deletes the given book from the system.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "deletebook" command is given by the user.
The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
DeleteBookWindow
DeleteBookWindow provides user to delete books from the library via GUI.
DeletePatron
Deletes a patron from the library.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method deletes the given patron from the system.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "deletepatron" command is given by the user.
The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
DeletePatronWindow
DeletePatronWindow allows user to delete patrons from the library via GUI.
Help
It shows the help message.
IssueBookWindow
IssueBookWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants issue a book to a patron.
This class is created and executed when "Issue" option is clicked under Books Menu in MainWindow class.
When executed, it displays a pop up window that provides two combo boxes to select the patron and the book.
Library
Library class models the whole library.
It has a collection of all books and all members (patrons) and can also hold other global library properties such as the maximum loan period in days.
LibraryData
LibraryData class is responsible for loading data to and storing data from the library, using the text file storage.
LibraryException
LibraryException extends Exception class and is a custom exception that is used to notify the user about errors or invalid commands.
ListBooks
Lists the books that are in the library.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method list the books in the system.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "listbooks" command is given by the user.
ListLoans
Lists all the loans currently in the system.
ListPatrons
Shows a list of all patrons of the library to the user.
LoadGUI
 
Loan
 
LoanDataManager
This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
It is an implementation of the DataManager interface.
It has a RESOURCE field that holds the path to the text file (loans.txt) that will be used as storage for loans data.
The loadData(Library) method loads data from 'loans.txt' file to the library.
The storeData(Library) method stores the book data that exist in the library to 'loans.txt' file.
Main
 
MainWindow
MainWindow creates the environment for displaying GUI components and configures the interactions between different components.
Commands (borrow, display, delete, etc...) are stored in Books and Patron Menus respectively and the commands are run when the user clicks on a specific command.
Patron
Patron class models a patron (member) of the library.
PatronDataManager
This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
It is an implementation of the DataManager interface.
It has a RESOURCE field that holds the path to the text file (patrons.txt) that will be used as storage for the books data.
The loadData(Library) method loads data from 'patrons.txt' file to the library.
The storeData(Library) method stores the book data that exist in the library to 'patrons.txt' file.
PatronLoanHistory
Lists all the terminated loans of a given patron.
RenewBook
Renews a loan for a specific amount of more days.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method renews the given patron from the system.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "renew" command is given by the user.
The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
RenewBookWindow
RenewBookWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants renew a loan.
This class is created and executed when "Renew" option is clicked under Books Menu in MainWindow class.
When executed, it displays a pop up window that provides two combo boxes to select the patron and the book.
Return
Returns a loan.
ReturnBookWindow
ReturnBookWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants return a book.
This class is created and executed when "Return" option is clicked under Books Menu in MainWindow class.
When executed, it displays a pop up window that provides two combo boxes to select the patron and the book.
ShowBook
Shows the information of the book that has been entered by the user.
ShowPatron
Shows the information of the patron that has been entered by the user.
